name: Wizard Warfare (KrazyK)
description:
CRITICS ARE SAYING: "Wizard Warfare is a game."

WAR! Monsters of The Dead have arisen after Halloween and are attacking the ancient cities of Wizworld. The Dead have already taken the capital of Brasswhole, but an important artifact that may change the course of the war still remains inside the city walls: the crystal key. You, a one-man army Commando Wizlord have been sent to safely acquire this weapon from the heart of the monster-ridden city. You know some beneficial spellbooks that can be acquired on your way to the center that may help you fight the hoard, but it will not be easy… 



NOTE: This game has no sound or title screen. It will close when you win.

This game was made for the second half of my Intro to Game Development class, as part of our Unreal Project. I am VERY happy with how it turned out, and tried my best to exceed all expectations of the actual assignment. It’s actually decently difficult too!

Your goal is to make it to the palace, acquire the key, and make it back to the entrance. Many enemies stand in your way, including zombies, skeletons, and enemy mages. On the way, explore the environment for helpful spells and mana to get through the hoard of undead. 

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Aim

Q / E - Cycle Spells

1234 - Select Spell

R - Swap Shoulder

Left Shift - Sprint

Special thanks to the model makers, as the game looks as cool as it does thanks to them!
